description: For our latest submition, we have the classic dorm room get together, with drinks, lots of hot guys and the ONE straight friend. After a few drinks, and some Hot Male bonding, our straight friend Jesse is not shy about getting turned on by guys at all. Who could blame him. Once all of the guys took their shirts off to see who had the best abs, and a quick push up contest to get things started, Jesse was ready to blow up. He mentioned that he has never gotten head from a guy, and thats all it took to raise the temperature in this dorm party, At first, Jesse seem nervous, but all of that goes away after they double team him for a hot Blow Job. From that point on, everything got so hot and steamy, is impossible to write about it. You just have to see for yourself.
title: Make It Double
